title: Important , MCA ISA
content:
I am a 1st Sem student of MCA,

I am not understanding anything of DS and Python subjects and the faculty told that it will be very difficult and major questions will be practical, and if anyone knows the marks distribution of assignments, quiz and isa marks please tell me i am worried

comments.body: Let me know, if you get any info!!

Isa- 40 marks
Quiz + assignment 10 marks

Ds and python and have experiential labs which are additional 20 marks
